summary: All six requirements appear to be fully implemented in the diff. REQ-1 through REQ-6 are all covered: product cards have Place Order, Add to Cart, and Wishlist buttons; a slide-out Cart drawer with quantity controls and subtotal exists; a slide-out Wishlist drawer exists; a CheckoutModal collects full address form with validation; UPI-only payment step is implemented; and all business detail text updates (About headline, location, phone number, tagline) are present across About, Contact, Footer, Hero, Navigation, and Services components.
